Hi everyone!
I have a question regarding multi-language variation when it comes to English. Is there any point in having different sites for example the US vs the UK? Is there anyone having different ones for different english? :us: :uk:

i think this depends entirely on the audience of the page, the customers of the client. Is there a significant difference that would need to be addressed with different content? Are there cultural differences in that industry justifying the usage of different wording?
